admin.contactmail: Email address to send feedback to
admin.contactdesc: This must be filled in to fully enable the feedback widget
admin.collect-email: Display (optional) email address field to users
admin.collect-email-help: When enabled, users are able to add their email address to the feedback
admin.position-help: Select bottom left or bottom right to display the feedback button
admin.background-color-help: Provide a hex color code to use as the background color, ie '#fff'
admin.font-color-help: Provide a hex color code to use as the font color, ie '#000'

feedback-widget.title: Flarum Feedback
feedback-widget.failed-message: Please try again. If this keeps happening, try to send an email instead.
